conversations.body_text: Hi Stuart Broadfield,    Please take a photograph of the brake pedal. It should have this cable attached to it.

As I’ve said previously (several times) THERE IS NO CABLE ON EITHER THR BRAKE OR THE HEELPLATE.

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi Stuart Broadfield,    Are the LEDs on both sides of your brake pedal not working properly? Please take a side photo and send it to us for reference. Also, please note that the brake LED module has two connectors, but we usually connect only one of them.              In addition, please remove these two M3 screws and send me a photo. I’ll check it for you and help resolve the issue.

My LED’s on the pedals work fine, I keep telling you the problem is I DON’T HAVE THE CABLE TO POWER THE RGB ON THE HEELPLATE AS YOU DIDN’T PROVIDE IT WHEN I BOUGHT THE PEDALS OR HEEL PLATE.

You can clearly see in the pictures I sent you there’s no cable on my pedals to connect to the RGB on the heel plate, however you sent me a picture of the cable I don’t have.

Rather than keep on asking me about my pedals, how about you send me the cable so I can connect the RGB of the heelplate to the brake pedal.

Thank you.

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
